customerWishMessage: Enter your message to us here.

about.description: We use cookies and similar technologies on our website and process personal data of visitors to our website (e.g. IP address), e.g. to personalise content, to integrate media from third-party providers or to analyse access to our website. Data processing only takes place when cookies are set. We share this data with third parties that we name in the settings. Data processing may be carried out with consent or on the basis of a legitimate interest. Consent can be given or refused. There is a right not to consent and to change or withdraw consent at a later date. Please note our {legal} and additional information regarding the use of personal data in our {policy}.
about.label: We value your privacy

general.wunschpaketIntroduction: Use the DHL preferred services and decide when and where you would like to receive your parcels.
general.wunschtagTitle: Preferred day: Delivery on the required day
general.wunschortTitle: Preferred location: Delivery to the required location
general.wunschnachbarTitle: Preferred neighbour: Delivery to the required neighbour
general.wunschtagTooltip: You can select one of the displayed days as preferred day for the delivery of your parcels. Due to the delivery processes, it is not possible to select other days at the moment.
general.wunschortTooltip: Determine a weatherproof location on your premises that is not obviously visible to third parties. We will deposit your parcel while you are absent.
general.wunschnachbarTooltip: Determine a person in the immediate vicinity to whom we will deliver your parcel. This person should live in the same house, directly on the opposite side or next door.
general.wunschpaketAdditionalCharge: When using this service, a surcharge of {additionalCharge} {currency} applies.*
